title: E. Jean Carroll Verdicts
summary: Civil jury found Trump sexually abused Carroll in 1996. Two verdicts totaling $88+ million for sexual abuse and defamation. Trump denies all allegations and is appealing.
keyFacts: 2023 verdict: Civil jury found Trump sexually abused Carroll in 1996 Bergdorf Goodman dressing room
Judge later stated the finding was 'rape' in common understanding
$5 million awarded for sexual abuse and defamation (May 2023)
Appeals court upheld verdict in December 2024
Trump denies ever meeting Carroll, calls allegations 'a hoax and a lie'

sources.text: U.S. District Court SDNY verdict, May 9, 2023
NBC News: Appeals court upholds $5 million E. Jean Carroll verdict against Trump
